meanings.definition: A heavy fabric with a raised pattern, used for upholstery and curtains.
meanings.sent1: The moreen draped elegantly over the windows, adding a touch of luxury to the room.
meanings.sent2: She chose a beautiful moreen fabric for the sofa to match the curtains.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat decided to play hide-and-seek behind the thick moreen hanging.
meanings.sent4: The intricate design on the moreen seemed to tell a story of its own.
meanings.sent5: The moreen's texture was so soft and inviting, like a cozy hug.

meanings.definition: To make a room or space more attractive or comfortable.
meanings.sent1: She used colorful cushions to moreen up the living room and make it cozy.
meanings.sent2: The addition of fairy lights really moreened the ambiance of the garden party.
meanings.sent3: He tried to moreen up his workspace by adding some motivational quotes.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter moreened the mood of the room, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh flowers moreened the entire house, making it feel welcoming.
